One proposal here is to make drcsim set both `/robot_description` and `/gazebo/robot_description` by default, with an roslaunch argument to skip setting `/robot_description`.  While simulation will switch to use `/gazebo/robot_description` so the un-namespaced ros param can be customized by teams.  How does that sound?
